info.title: Hero City
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Hero City is a game about a super hero who fights monsters in a city.

Controls:
Pointer = Turn
Analog stick = Move
A button = Jump
Z button = Run / Fly
C button = Left attack
Z button = Right attack

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com

music (La busqueda de Ianna) by Epic Soul Factory
